Pokemon.Name: STRELICH
Pokemon.Description: BIRD OF PARADISE\nA Strelich in a garden is a symbol of prestige. The petals around its neck give off a pleasant aroma and because of that they quickly became an ingredient of expensive parfumes. Tearing off a petal isn't pleasant to Strelich; waiting for it to fall off naturally is advised.
Pokemon.Stats: Hp=70 Attack=99 Defense=85 SpAttack=0 SpDefense=0 Speed=115
Pokemon.Ability: LIGHTWEIGHT \nDeals 10% more damage to the opponent with WIND-type attacks. \nThe opponent deals 10% more damage to the user with WIND-type attacks.
Pokemon.ConceptOrigin: Strelich is based on large flightless birds; although much smaller than them. A garden lily's petals adorn the bird's neck, while the head resembles a flower of Strelitzia, a plant often called "bird of paradise". The shiny colors are based on Strelitzia nicolai. \nThe name is a mixture of words "Strelitzia" and "ostrich".
